channel.title: Comments on: Subverted Tropes: The Fiction of the Unexpected
channel.description: BDSM, books and missing links by Xiao Yingtai

item.title: By: Xiao Yingtai
item.dc:creator: Xiao Yingtai
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/subverted-tropes/#comment-859">TammyJo Eckhart, PhD</a>.
I'm certainly intrigued! And I remember seeing your comments around the slashosphere, so I'm guessing we have similar ideas of what is fun to read!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to TammyJo Eckhart, PhD.

I’m certainly intrigued! And I remember seeing your comments around the slashosphere, so I’m guessing we have similar ideas of what is fun to read!

item.title: By: TammyJo Eckhart, PhD
item.dc:creator: TammyJo Eckhart, PhD
item.description: I've been told by my readers that my stuff is pretty unusual and subversive as well as realistic for their settings/genres.
item.content:encoded: I’ve been told by my readers that my stuff is pretty unusual and subversive as well as realistic for their settings/genres.

item.title: By: Yingtai
item.dc:creator: Yingtai
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/subverted-tropes/#comment-2">Patricia</a>.
You are so right, Dr Fell definitely subverts tropes. But while you took a long time to warm up to those characters, I couldn't do it at all: <a href="http://www.amazon.com/Lost-Found-Syd-McGinley-ebook/dp/B005CII9FS/ref=cm_cr-mr-title#rev-dpReviewsMostHelpful-R3RXPBZB74SUC9" rel="nofollow">Amazon review here</a>. I had a similarly visceral reaction to her <a href="http://www.amazon.com/What-Worse-Place-Your-Love-ebook/product-reviews/B004GHN4AG/ref=cm_cr_pr_top_helpful?ie=UTF8&showViewpoints=0&sortBy=byRankDescending#R6V5ZB6S156HZ" rel="nofollow">venture into science fiction</a>. She must be a good writer to punch me in the gut like that, but I guess she's just the kind of writer that people love or hate?
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Patricia.

You are so right, Dr Fell definitely subverts tropes. But while you took a long time to warm up to those characters, I couldn’t do it at all: Amazon review here. I had a similarly visceral reaction to her venture into science fiction. She must be a good writer to punch me in the gut like that, but I guess she’s just the kind of writer that people love or hate?

item.title: By: Patricia
item.dc:creator: Patricia
item.description: Syd McGinley...Very succinct and emotional tales. It took me a while to warm to Dr. John Fell and the whole gang. Then - wow.
item.content:encoded: Syd McGinley…Very succinct and emotional tales. It took me a while to warm to Dr. John Fell and the whole gang. Then – wow.
